-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Type save tuples for HDBC
--   
--   Type save tuples for HDBC
@package hdbc-tuple
@version 0.0.1

module Database.HDBC.Tuple
instance (Convertible SqlValue a, Convertible [SqlValue] b) => Convertible [SqlValue] (a :#: b)
instance (Convertible a SqlValue, Convertible b [SqlValue]) => Convertible (a :#: b) [SqlValue]
instance Convertible [SqlValue] HNil
instance Convertible HNil [SqlValue]
